name: Hell Heavenire
description:
This is a logic pathfinder game. 

You are playing as an Angel and Demon. They are friends and having a good time until God decided to have a joke on them... 

You are joined directly to your friend.
When you move - your friend moves in the same direction, and he can't find the way out without your help!
Help Angel and Demon to find the way out of God's labyrinth, so they can finally be free and happy! 

The game was made for the game jam GMTK2021
Game engine: Construct 2 

Made by COLLISION CHECK game studio 

Creators: 

Oscar - Game design & Development
EnergyDashClarko - Game design & Development
Aprelich - Game design & Level design
Little Prince - Graphic artist
Dezzzo - Music artist 

All sprites, animations and music themes were made in around 40 hours by our fantastic artists. We really enjoy having them in our team!
